description: Fired when a character builder operation exceeds performance thresholds.

payloadSchema.title: Core: Character Builder Performance Warning Event Payload
payloadSchema.description: Defines the payload structure for the 'core:character_builder_performance_warning' event, used for monitoring performance issues in character builder operations.

controller.description: Required. The name of the controller class where the performance issue occurred.

measurement.description: Required. The name of the performance measurement that exceeded the threshold.

duration.description: Required. The actual duration of the operation in milliseconds.

threshold.description: Required. The performance threshold that was exceeded in milliseconds.

timestamp.description: Optional. ISO 8601 timestamp of when the performance warning occurred.
